welcome_message.description: Welcome message shown when user starts the bot
welcome_message.other: Welcome to the Gofency Bot! How can I help you today?

invalid_command.other: Sorry, I didn't understand that command.

captcha_welcome.description: Welcome message for new user with captcha challenge
captcha_welcome.other: Welcome, {{.Username}}! Please complete the captcha verification within 30 seconds to join the chat.

captcha_prompt.description: Prompt to enter the captcha answer
captcha_prompt.other: Enter the numbers from the image above:

captcha_failed.other: ❌ Incorrect answer. You have been removed from the chat and banned for 10 minutes.

captcha_timeout.description: Message when captcha verification times out
captcha_timeout.other: ⏱ Verification timeout. {{.Username}} have been removed from the chat and banned for 10 minutes.
